* * Solution Outline * *  
 To address this , we will enhance the existing churn pipeline by integrating an * upsell candidate score * .
This score will be derived using new features such as recent spend delta ( month - over - month changes ) and feature adoption velocity ( rate of product usage growth ) .
using new features such as recent spend delta ( month - over - month changes )
feature adoption velocity ( rate of product usage growth )
This phased rollout will allow time for iterative tuning before full deployment .
